#summary Version 2.1.3 release notes.
#labels Featured,Notes

=Version 2.1.3 release notes=

Updated the plugin to work with TinyMCE 3.4, which introduced internal changes that broke the plugin with IE6 and IE7 browsers.

Changed files:

  * changelog.txt
  * tinyautosave/editor_plugin.js
  * tinyautosave/editor_plugin_src.js
  * demo/demo.htm

==Download==

You can grab version 2.1.3 on the [http://code.google.com/p/tinyautosave/downloads/list Downloads] page.
